code: import produce from"immer";export var addItemToCart=function addItemToCart(state,action){var newItemId=action.payload.id;var cart=produce(state,function(draft){if(!state.items.some(function(item){return item.id===newItemId;})){draft.items.push({id:newItemId,count:1});}else{draft.items.find(function(item){return item.id===newItemId;}).count+=1;}});localStorage.setItem("cart",JSON.stringify(cart));return cart;};// console.log( JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(state.items)))
